item.title: My data science coding cheatsheet: Numpy, Scikit, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Keras
item.description: I’m tired of looking up the same functions that I repeatedly use for my machine learning pipeline for loading, pre-processing, training and evaluating models. Now I’m on a mission to compile them all on this page. Table of Contents Numpy Pandas Matplotlib Scikit-learn Dimnesionality reduction Pipelines Keras Numpy import numpy as np np.random.seed(42) # Set random seed a = np.arange(6) # [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5] a.
